Title: Day 8: 7:00 P.M. - 8:00 P.M.
Plot: While the newly-upgraded CTU is challenged by some unexpected and complicated circumstances, Jack Bauer becomes even more involved in preventing an upcoming assassination attempt on Omar Hassan, a visiting President. Meanwhile, international security is jeopardized by an explosive event, and Jack is reunited with agent Renee Walker.
GuestStars: Kiefer Sutherland, Mary Lynn Rajskub, Anil Kapoor
